Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20025333 TCQ, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Krilic Enterprises, Inc, to establish, maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 30-95 33rd Street, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 22.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

Application no. 20025386 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Lark Restaurant, Inc., d/b/a Taci, to establish, maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 2841 Broadway, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 9.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

Application no. 20025186 TCM, pursuant to §20-225 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Strokos Gourmet Deli, Inc., to continue to maintain and operate an enclosed sidewalk café located at 1090 Amsterdam Avenue, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 9.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-225(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

Application no. 20025150 TCM, pursuant to §20-225 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of 1600 Third Pub Inc., d/b/a Big City Bar and Grill, to continue to maintain and operate an enclosed sidewalk café located at 1600 Third Avenue, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 5.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-225(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 010668 ZMQ, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 25.
